title: Are you sure this is going to be okay?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Im trusting you guys here...

Ill admit that I'm no fan of the assassin meta, but I will gladly kiss the feet of a little golden Zed statue every night before bed, before I ever willingly go back to the tank meta....

That was the epitome of anti-fun.

God forbid the mid season update should start us down that slippery slope again..

Please tell me it wont happen..
Im trusting you.

replies.body: ..... plz tell me this is like 65% damage reduction ðŸ˜‘......
Why ?  less damage ? she has 100% of her damage lol

The more armour you have the more the scaling of damage reduction reduces (hover over the armour icon and it will tell you how much reduced physical damage you take).

Im gonna take a stab that this would         
Be 85 to 90% ðŸ˜‘

Today I saw my first rework Sejuani and I was completely confused when I happened on her stats. Hell, I even counted up what her items were supposed to be giving her. Then I remembered that in the short clips showing her abilities she had a slow resist shield that broke after taking damage or something and figured it had something to do with that. 

>Frost Armor: Sejuani receives Frost Armor if she hasn't taken damage in the last 9 seconds, lingering for 1 / 2 / 3 seconds after taking damage from enemy champions.

>Frost Armor engulfs Bristle in True Ice, becoming immune to Slow and gains 100 (+ 100% total armor) bonus armor and 100 (+ 100% total magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.

Ends up Frost Armour is a lot like Malzahar's passive, or at least _was_ before it was nerfed. While the shield is up you can't do anything and after it's broken you start swinging. Except that in the late game three seconds is a really long time to be close to 1000 armour, especially when you're diving the backline (which Malzahar usually doesn't do), and you're still going to be tanky afterwards.

Who knows, it's still early days. We haven't even heard the classic "but you can just kite them" rebuttal yet so I'm going to hold off on welcoming (back) any tank overlords ; )

Yea that is a long time to be basically immune to damage.
But like you say, we will have to see.

Im pretty sure kiting died a long time ago in this game xD. Pretty sure the only champs that can kite now are like Vayne, Draven, Xayah, Lucian and one or two others. Even Kalista and Ashe can't really do it anymore, and hell, there supposed to be the kiting Queens.

atm, fighters (which are basically tanks anyway) have so much speed that kiting becomes a near pointless exercise :(
thats why i always ban Sej and ask other people to ban if i can't
Holy shit, no way that isn't photoshoped, road to 1000 armor confirmed?
